string-array.name: liga_desc
string-array.item: Serie A was the only league to produce three founding members.
The Scottish Premiership is the top division of the Scottish Professional Football League
The Primeira Liga First League; Portuguese pronunciation: formerly called Primeira Divis
Serie A also called Serie A TIM due to sponsorship by Telecom Italia
The Fußball-Bundesliga (English: Football Federal League), commonly known as the Bundesliga
The Premier League (often referred to as the English Premier League (EPL) outside England)
Football League One (often referred to as League One for short or Sky Bet League 1)
The A-League is a professional men soccer league, run by Football Federation Australia (FFA)
Major League Soccer (MLS) is a professional soccer league representing the sport
Ligue 1 (French pronunciation: ​; League 1, formerly known as Division 1)
